scripts.test: mocha
scripts.build: gobble build -f dist
scripts.prepublish: npm test
scripts.test-coverage: rm -rf coverage/* && istanbul cover --report json node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u exports -R spec test/test.js

scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm test && npm run build:browser
scripts.build:browser: git rev-parse HEAD > .commithash && rollup -c rollup.config.browser.js -o dist/rollup.browser.js
scripts.test-coverage: rm -rf coverage/* && istanbul cover --report json node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u exports -R spec test/test.js
scripts.posttest-coverage: remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.json -b dist && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.lcov -t lcovonly -b dist && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped -t html -b dist

scripts.build:browser: git rev-parse HEAD > .commithash && rollup -c rollup.config.browser.js
scripts.test-coverage: rm -rf coverage/* && istanbul cover --report json node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u exports -R spec test/test.js
scripts.posttest-coverage: remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.json -b dist && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.lcov -t lcovonly -b dist && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped -t html -b dist

scripts.build: git rev-parse HEAD > .commithash && rollup -c && tsc -p tsconfig-types.json && chmod a+x bin/rollup
scripts.test-coverage: rm -rf coverage/* && istanbul cover --report json node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u exports -R spec test/test.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run test:leak
scripts.test:typescript: tsc -p test/typescript

scripts.pretest:typescript: rm -rf test/typescript/dist && rm -rf test/typescript/typings && cp -r dist test/typescript/ && cp -r typings test/typescript/

scripts.ci:lint: npm run lint:nofix && npm run security

scripts.build:test: shx rm -rf dist && rollup -c --configNoBrowser && shx cp src/rollup/types.d.ts dist/rollup.d.ts && shx chmod a+x bin/rollup

scripts.test:coverage: shx rm -rf coverage/* && istanbul cover --report json node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u exports -R spec test/test.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm ci && npm run lint:nofix && npm run security && npm run build:bootstrap && npm run test:all
scripts.build:bootstrap: bin/rollup -c && shx cp src/rollup/types.d.ts dist/rollup.d.ts && shx chmod a+x bin/rollup
scripts.test:typescript: tsc --noEmit -p test/typescript && tsc --noEmit
scripts.pretest:coverage: npm run build:test
scripts.posttest:coverage: remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.json -b dist && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.lcov -t lcovonly -b dist && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped -t html -b dist
scripts.pretest:typescript: shx rm -rf test/typescript/dist && shx cp -r dist test/typescript/

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && git rev-parse HEAD > .commithash && rollup -c && shx cp src/rollup/types.d.ts dist/rollup.d.ts && shx chmod a+x dist/bin/rollup
scripts.ci:test: npm run build:test && npm run build:bootstrap && npm run test:all
scripts.test:all: npm run test:only && npm run test:typescript && npm run test:leak && npm run test:package
scripts.build:test: shx rm -rf dist && rollup -c --configTest && shx cp src/rollup/types.d.ts dist/rollup.d.ts && shx chmod a+x dist/bin/rollup
scripts.lint:nofix: npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:markdown
scripts.ci:coverage: npm run build:test && nyc --reporter lcovonly mocha && codecov
scripts.ci:test:only: npm run build:test && npm run build:bootstrap && npm run test:only
scripts.test:coverage: nyc --reporter html mocha
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm ci && npm run lint:nofix && npm run security && npm run build:bootstrap && npm run test:all
scripts.build:bootstrap: dist/bin/rollup -c && shx cp src/rollup/types.d.ts dist/rollup.d.ts && shx chmod a+x dist/bin/rollup
scripts.test:typescript: tsc --noEmit -p test/typescript && tsc --noEmit
scripts.pretest:coverage: npm run build:test && shx rm -rf coverage/*
scripts.pretest:typescript: shx rm -rf test/typescript/dist && shx cp -r dist test/typescript/

scripts.build: concurrently -c green,blue "npm run build:wasm" "npm:build:ast-converters" && concurrently -c green,blue "npm run build:napi -- --release" "npm:build:js" && npm run build:copy-native
scripts.prepare: husky && node scripts/check-release.js || npm run build:prepare
scripts.test:all: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -c green,blue,magenta,cyan,red 'npm:test:only' 'npm:test:browser' 'npm:test:typescript' 'npm:test:package' 'npm:test:options'
scripts.test:cjs: npm run build:cjs && npm run test:only
scripts.lint:rust: cd rust && cargo fmt && cargo clippy --fix --allow-dirty
scripts.update:js: npm run build:js && npm run build:copy-native
scripts.build:napi: napi build --platform --dts native.d.ts --js false --cargo-cwd rust -p bindings_napi --cargo-name bindings_napi
scripts.build:wasm: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-C opt-level=z" wasm-pack build rust/bindings_wasm --out-dir ../../wasm --target web --no-pack && shx rm wasm/.gitignore
scripts.ci:coverage: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:copy-native && npm run build:bootstrap && npm run build:copy-native && nyc --reporter lcovonly mocha
scripts.ci:test:all: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:copy-native && npm run build:bootstrap && npm run build:copy-native && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -c green,blue,magenta,cyan 'npm:test:only' 'npm:test:typescript' 'npm:test:leak' 'npm:test:browser'

scripts.ci:test:only: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:copy-native && npm run build:bootstrap && npm run build:copy-native && npm run test:only
scripts.release:docs: git fetch --update-head-ok origin master:master && git branch --force documentation-published master && git push origin documentation-published
scripts.build:prepare: concurrently -c green,blue "npm run build:napi -- --release" "npm:build:js:node" && npm run build:copy-native
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build:cjs && shx rm -rf coverage/* && nyc --reporter html mocha test/test.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: node scripts/check-release.js && node scripts/prepublish.js
scripts.build:bootstrap: shx mv dist dist-build && node dist-build/bin/rollup --config rollup.config.ts --configPlugin typescript --forceExit && shx rm -rf dist-build
scripts.build:wasm:node: wasm-pack build rust/bindings_wasm --out-dir ../../wasm-node --target nodejs --no-pack && shx rm wasm-node/.gitignore
scripts.lint:rust:nofix: cd rust && cargo fmt --check && cargo clippy
scripts.test:typescript: shx rm -rf test/typescript/dist && shx cp -r dist test/typescript/ && tsc --noEmit -p test/typescript && tsc --noEmit && tsc --noEmit -p scripts
scripts.build:copy-native: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp rollup.*.node dist/
scripts.build:bootstrap:cjs: shx mv dist dist-build && node dist-build/bin/rollup --config rollup.config.ts --configPlugin typescript --configTest --forceExit && shx rm -rf dist-build
scripts.test:coverage:browser: npm run build && shx rm -rf coverage/* && nyc mocha test/browser/index.js
